comment: Easy class but alot of work that can pile up on you veryyyy fast. Everything is due on Thursdays as well when it comes to homework assignments.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Caring

comment: A TON of reading on Cengage with videos and a short quiz each chapter. A few discussions to do, three tests, and a museum analysis over one piece. Pretty simple stuff just don't let it pile up on you or you will be swamped. Trust me. Write down the dates because when assignments close, they are CLOSED.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: This professor is not difficult at all, you only have to do 4 discussion posts, a few tests, and a museum project. She is very lenient and accessible. I highly recommend taking her.

This class is easy and she provided many resources for you to learn. The only thing you need to pay attention to is the deadline of assignements because there will be no make up opportunities. She will respond to your email, but sometimes it will take a long time for her to do. Tests were on Cengage and no lockdown browser or camera.

I had this course online and Prof Phillips made it very easy. All of the Hw was on cengage. She gives 10ish discussion posts (1 per week) but only grades 4 so u can choose which one you want to do. I think they are also graded on completion but don't quote me. She gives one museum analysis and 3 tests which werent hard at all. No webcam or lockdown
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things--Online Savvy

comment: I took the online class for fall of 2024 and the class itself is a pretty easy class. The only thing is that she rarely responds to emails. If you turn in late work or miss an exam she will put a zero because "she has too many students to go back", So make sure to read all deadlines. She makes mistakes on grade book so check your grades daily.

This teacher is pretty easy. At first in assignments I found the work complicated to understand however, overtime, it became easier to understand. Class is an easy A but be prepared to do discussion posts and go through the videos and practice questions. If you need any assistance or understanding she does respond back 10/10 take her.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Very easy class. Most free A of my life.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Easy A!! take her!!! 2 Weekly quizzes, 3 tests, a mandatory museum assignment, and 4 200-400-word module responses.

Professor Phillips was amazing. Her online class grades were weekly quizzes of reading and art pieces, 4 tests, and occasional written responses to the textbook. This was a very easy A, just make sure to do the weekly modules. Take her class if you are looking for an easy online class to satisfy your requirements!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class
